title: Dragon Naturally Speaking 10 Preferred
description:
Dragon NaturallySpeaking 10 Preferred
Create Email, Documents and Spreadsheets - All by Voice


I'm putting up this version as many reported problems with the existing torrents for this software. And the basic instructions where to complicated and didn't even work for many.

To make this work, you still have to follow some simple instruction that I made to make the installation. 
As the original installation have some bugs in it,the software company Nuance made a fix. Although don't follow the Nuance instructions but simply follow mine to make it work.

STEP 1: 

Download and extract 'http://download.scansoft.com/naturallyspeaking/10/DragonInstall.zip'

STEP 2: Double click the "install_dragon.vbs" file.  

STEP 3: Options will pop-up. Hit 'NO' twice, until the box will appear asking for the location of the installation.
Here you enter the location of your DVD-drive, that is d:, e:, f: or some else depending on your own system.

STEP 4: When you have entered the location and hit OK, the installation will begin as without any problem for you.

Here is the original technical support knowledge base: http://knowledgebase.nuance.com/view.asp?60VQ=KFHM

That's it! 

After the installation, make sure you do the advanced voice setup, so that transmission will be as accurate as possible.
